snippet.title: Faceball 2000 - Game Boy
snippet.description: Possibly one of the easiest gameplays I've encountered, and strange at the same time.  Pretty much, the whole game is controlling a smiley emoji and wander around a maze looking for a flashy exit.  There's doors, floor buttons, more smileys that are emenies that just stand in your way, capsules, glass doors that you can't see and even more smileys that shoot you.
